targets.query:
from(bucket: "kouvas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurements")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FECDOWN" or r["_field"]=="FECUP")
  |> window(every: 1h)
  |> spread()
  |> duplicate(column: "_start", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)

from(bucket: "kouvas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "measurements")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CRCDOWN" or r["_field"]=="CRCUP")
  |> window(every: 1h)
  |> spread()
  |> duplicate(column: "_start", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)

list.description: My location according to my IP
list.name: fuckingLocation
